items.title: What we know about Lisbon's deadly funicular crash
items.description: At least 16 people died after a carriage on the city's famous Gl√≥ria hillside railway derailed.

items.title: One killed and at least six injured in  mass stabbing in Canada
items.description: The suspected attacker also died in the incident in Hollow Water First Nation, north of Winnipeg, police say.

items.title: Who are the victims of the Lisbon funicular cable crash?
items.description: Four employees of a non-profit organisation and a transport worker are among those who died.

items.title: Boy, 3, pulled from funicular crash that has shocked Portugal
items.description: It is unclear what caused the crash in which 16 people died and more than 20 were injured, including many foreign nationals.

items.title: Watch: Key moments from RFK Jr's heated Senate hearing
items.description: Robert F Kennedy Jr faced questions on Covid deaths, vaccines and his record as the US health secretary during an often contentious hearing.
